name: David Letterman
monologue: After the earthquake on the East Coast, they found Mayor Bloomberg standing under his desk.

name: David Letterman
monologue: Top Ten Things Overheard During The East Coast Earthquake

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: We had an Anthrax scare at the studio after they found an envelope with white powder in it. All of the staff had to leave and didn’t get any work done. It was like any other day.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: This is the most attention this show has gotten . . . ever.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: They say the envelope came from France. I knew I shouldn’t have done that Gerard Depardieu joke.

name: Craig Ferguson
monologue: If this had been a real threat, CBS has a plan to replace me with Ashton Kutcher.
